rooms.description: A spacious living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north side to maximize natural light and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
An adjacent dining area with a semi-open design that connects to the courtyard for fresh air circulation.
A modern kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows on one wall, promoting ventilation and alignment with Vastu principles by orienting it towards the east.
An open entrance area that leads to both indoor and outdoor spaces, designed in a colonial style with subtle classical detailing.
A guest bathroom with functional design and adequate natural light from window placements.
